name: Sidebar UX Fix Workflow
description: Complete workflow for fixing sidebar CTA visibility issues during infinite scroll operations
prerequisites: Sidebar component with bottom CTAs exists
Layout issues identified (CTAs hidden during scroll)

steps.title: Identify Layout Problem
steps.description: Analyze sidebar layout issues causing CTA visibility problems
actions: Test infinite scroll functionality
Identify that Add Article and Account buttons disappear during scrolling
Screenshot current broken layout for documentation
Analyze CSS flexbox structure causing the issue
steps.validation: CTAs are confirmed to be hidden during infinite scroll operations

steps.title: Fix Sidebar Component Layout
steps.description: Apply proper flexbox constraints to ensure CTA visibility
actions: Add h-full to sidebar container for proper height constraints
Apply flex-shrink-0 to header section to prevent compression
Add overflow-y-auto to navigation for scrollable content
Apply flex-shrink-0 to bottom CTA section with explicit background
Test layout with different content volumes
steps.validation: Sidebar CTAs remain visible with proper flex behavior

steps.title: Fix App Layout Container
steps.description: Update main app layout to prevent interference with sidebar
actions: Add min-h-0 to main flex container for proper flex behavior
Apply min-w-0 to content area to prevent overflow
Add flex-shrink-0 to header to maintain fixed position
Update main content with min-h-0 for proper scroll container
Test layout integration with infinite scroll
steps.validation: Main content layout works seamlessly with fixed sidebar CTAs

steps.title: Test Cross-Platform Compatibility
steps.description: Verify layout works across different operating systems and screen sizes
actions: Test on macOS with different screen sizes
Verify layout on Windows if available
Test with different zoom levels
Verify touch scrolling works properly
Test with large content volumes (5,000+ articles)
steps.validation: Layout works consistently across all platforms and screen sizes

steps.title: Document Layout Patterns
steps.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the layout fix
actions: Create .clinerules pattern for sidebar layout fixes
Document broken vs fixed layout patterns
Add implementation standards and best practices
Include success metrics and testing checklist
Update memory bank with layout architecture patterns
steps.validation: Complete documentation created for future reference

successCriteria: Add Article and Account buttons always visible during scrolling
Infinite scroll works seamlessly with sidebar layout
Professional appearance maintained across all scroll states
No layout thrashing during scroll events

troubleshooting.issue: CTAs still hidden after applying flex-shrink-0
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure h-full is applied to sidebar container and check for conflicting CSS

troubleshooting.issue: Layout breaks on different screen sizes
troubleshooting.solution: Test min-h-0 and min-w-0 constraints on flex containers
Verify overflow-y-auto is only applied to navigation section, not entire sidebar
Add explicit background colors to CTA section with dark mode variants

keyLearnings: flex-shrink-0 is critical for elements that must remain visible
Proper height constraints (h-full, min-h-0) are essential for complex layouts
Explicit backgrounds prevent transparency issues during scroll operations
Testing with real-world data volumes reveals layout issues early
Cross-platform testing is essential for desktop applications
